title: HAP 31 - Justin Smith on Amo and Race in Early Modern Philosophy
itunes:title: HAP 31 - Justin Smith on Amo and Race in Early Modern Philosophy
description: Justin E.H. Smith joins us to discuss Anton Wilhelm Amo against the background of ideas about race in early modern philosophy, including Leibniz.
content:encoded: Justin E.H. Smith joins us to discuss Anton Wilhelm Amo against the background of ideas about race in early modern philosophy, including Leibniz.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
